message.content:
1. Topical AE ointment can reduce abdominal fat thickness.
2. Topical AE ointment can reduce waist circumference.
3. Topical AE ointment does not cause any side effects.

messages.content:
Statement: Topical AE ointment can reduce the abdominal fat thickness as well as the waist circumference without causing any side effect.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
